languages.text: "Так подойди поближе и отведай его! Или боишься обжечься?" {n}Ваш выстрел проходит сквозь экран, не нанеся ему повреждений. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так подойди поближе и отведай его! Или боишься обжечься?" {n}Ваш выстрел проходит сквозь экран, не нанеся ему повреждений. Саргона бросает быстрый взгляд на один из генераторов в стороне, будто проверяя его сохранность.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

"Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

languages.text: "Dann kommt näher und kostet! Oder habt Ihr Angst, Euch zu verbrennen?" {n}Dein Schuss geht direkt durch den Bildschirm, ohne Schaden zu verursachen. Sargona warft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann kommt näher und kostet! Oder habt Ihr Angst, Euch zu verbrennen?" {n}Dein Schuss geht direkt durch den Bildschirm, ohne Schaden zu verursachen. Sargona warft einen raschen Blick auf einen der Generatoren an der Seite, als wolle er prüfen, ob er noch intakt ist.{/n}

languages.text: « Alors, approchez ! Venez voir de plus près ! À moins que vous ayez peur des brûlures ? » {n}Votre tir traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Alors, approchez ! Venez voir de plus près ! À moins que vous ayez peur des brûlures ? » {n}Votre tir traverse l'écran sans la moindre trace de dégâts. Sargona lance un rapide coup d'œil à l'un des générateurs sur le côté, comme pour vérifier qu'il est toujours intact.{/n}

languages.text: “不如你亲自过来尝尝吧！还是说，你害怕被烧成焦炭？”{n}你的子弹径自穿过了屏障，没能造成任何伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不如你亲自过来尝尝吧！还是说，你害怕被烧成焦炭？”{n}你的子弹径自穿过了屏障，没能造成任何伤害。萨戈纳瞥了一眼旁边的发电机，似乎在检查发电机是否完好无损。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Acércate y ven por él! ¿O te da miedo quemarte?». {n}Tu disparo atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay a un lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Acércate y ven por él! ¿O te da miedo quemarte?». {n}Tu disparo atraviesa limpiamente la pantalla sin causar ningún daño. Sargona mira de soslayo uno de los generadores que hay a un lado, como si quisiera comprobar que sigue intacto.{/n}

languages.text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの射撃はスクリーンを貫通するが、何のダメージも与えられなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ならば近くに来て味わってみろ！それとも、焼かれるのが怖いのか？」{n}あなたの射撃はスクリーンを貫通するが、何のダメージも与えられなかった。サルゴナは横にある発生装置のひとつに素早く視線を向け、まだ無事かどうかを確かめるかのような様子を見せた。{/n}

languages.text: "Öyleyse yaklaş da tadına bak! Yoksa yanmaktan mı korkuyorsun?" {n}Atışın, herhangi bir hasar meydana getirmeden ekranın içinden geçip gidiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then come closer and have a taste! Or are you afraid of getting burnt?" {n}Your shot passes straight through the screen without doing any damage. Sargona casts a quick glance at one of the generators off to the side, as if checking that it is still intact.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Öyleyse yaklaş da tadına bak! Yoksa yanmaktan mı korkuyorsun?" {n}Atışın, herhangi bir hasar meydana getirmeden ekranın içinden geçip gidiyor. Sargona, sanki hâlâ sağlam olup olmadığını kontrol ediyormuş gibi yan taraftaki jeneratörlerden birine hızla göz atıyor.{/n}
